macros.title: My 1st Macro.
macros.description: When calling a function with no arguments, it is important not to specify values in the 'args' array.

macros.title: My 2nd Macro.
macros.description: The three strings specified in the argument will be combined and displayed in an Excel message box.

macros.title: My 3rd Macro.
macros.description: The two numbers specified in the argument will be combined and displayed in an Excel message box.
